Text:
Its worth mentioning the author of this Crack is the same guy who made the "Office 2010 Toolkit and EZ-Activator"
which I'm sure a few million people are currently using..
Also the EZ-Activator is discontinued and the tool in this torrent is intended to replace the old tool.. The old forum topic for "EZ-Activator" is locked and the author has stated that support and updates are now only for the new tool.
No offence, but i would advise people get their cracks from the original source when possible..
Here is the link to the release page for the discontinued tool
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/18746-Office-2010-Toolkit-and-EZ-Activator
And here is the link to the official release page for the new tool (same as torrent)
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/28669-Microsoft-Toolkit-Official-KMS-Solution-for-Windows-and-Office-2010

Also that forum is the same place that the "Windows Loader" by DAZ is released at..
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/24901-Windows-Loader-Current-release-information

Always good to provide some info with your torrents ;)

Such as..
This newer tool now supports Windows + Office in 1 tool

Have installed office before. All was working until a week ago, until serial was invalidated.
Run Office Toolkit 2.3.2> Activation Tab> Activate and following shows up:

---Processing--------------------------
----------------------------------------
Installed product key detected - attempting to activate the following product:
SKU ID: 6f327760-8c5c-417c-9b61-836a98287e0c
LICENSE NAME: Office 14, OfficeProPlus-KMS_Client
LICENSE DESCRIPTION: Office 14, VOLUME_KMSCLIENT channel
Last 5 characters of installed product key: H3GVB
ERROR CODE: 0x8007000D
ERROR TEXT: The data is invalid.

----------------------------------------

Any ideas?

ok...hint for everyone experiencing problem above:
click EZActivator instead of Activate key!

Bigggg Thanks to nikita200!
Great work nikita,you try to help people and all you get is verbal crap. Keep up the good work. Ooops nearly forgot but it works like a dream.

@ nikita200 if this is the guy that first made Office 2010 Toolkit any chance he might get it working again Microsoft has caught up with his crack and the tool kit permanent activation is not working anymore.KMS is but any chance of a permanent activation ???????
Flawless victory on W7 Ultimate x64.  Selected EZ Activator option per blackMule.  I now have 180 day activation. Thanks!

@ xpmule

although you are generally right, torrents are much more stable right now the direct link is down (on the new and old one) also here is a link to the actual download page of the official toolkit

good luck and thanks uplaoder
